label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_024
content:
## 2024-08-12 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 124
- Active: 116
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 34
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 8

### Enrollment by Dose Group
- Low Dose: 31
- Mid Dose: 30
- High Dose: 31
- Placebo: 32

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (gMU) Mean: 57.2
  - IgG Titer (gMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (gMU) Mean: 19.7
  - IgM Titer (gMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 86.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 131.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 99.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 24.5
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (gMU) Mean: 92.9
  - IgG Titer (gMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (gMU) Mean: 31.8
  - IgM Titer (gMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 146.1
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 217.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 153.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 37.7
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (gMU) Mean: 123.9
  - IgG Titer (gMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (gMU) Mean: 43.1
  - IgM Titer (gMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 194.1
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 292.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 214.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 44.4
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (gMU) Mean: 11.2
  - IgG Titer (gMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (gMU) Mean: 1.3
  - IgM Titer (gMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 15.1
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 34.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 5.4

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 45.5
- Erythema Percentage: 14.6
- Swelling Percentage: 17.8
- Induration Percentage: 3.5
- Mean Pain Duration (hours): 16.0

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 21.8
- Fatigue Percentage: 28.7
- Myalgia Percentage: 27.9
- Headache Percentage: 24.7
- Chills Percentage: 14.0

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K): Mean: 8.1
- WBC (K) SD: 1.6
- Lymphocyte Percentage: Mean: 35.2
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 7.3
- Neutrophil Percentage: Mean: 57.8
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 9.9
- Platelets (K): Mean: 227
- Platelets (K) SD: 40
- CRP (mg/L): Mean: 4.4
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.5
- Hemoglobin (g/dL): Mean: 14.0
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 1.4

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-2478, Description: myalgia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2443, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2424, Description: fatigue, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-2476, Description: myalgia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose

### Events
- Site 01 monitoring visit, 0 minor findings
- Cold chain temperature log reviewed: all within -70C +/- 5C
- Vaccine lot VX-153 temperature excursion assessed: within acceptable range

### Notes
- Week 24: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 124 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
